articles.title: Nail-biting research rules out 2052 asteroid impact on Earth - The Indian Express
articles.description: The asteroid 2021 QM1 was discovered in August 2021 and was added to the top of the European Space Agency's risk list. But a series of cosmic events meant that scientists had a very small window to figure out whether the asteroid would strike Earth in 2052.

articles.title: WHO calls for pressing action to contain monkeypox risk in Europe - Prensa Latina
articles.description: Moscow, Jul 2 (Prensa Latina) The WHO representative in Russia, Melita Vujnovic, on Saturday warned the risk of monkeypox spread across Europe is too high due to outbreaks reported in new regional nations.
